title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Organizational Innovation for Computer-Assisted Learning (CAL) Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and introductory knowledge of social sciences
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain three strategies (replacement, enhancement, innovation) for integrating CAL into organizational learning environments
Learners can apply a framework to analyze the appropriateness of CAL tools in small team-based activities
Learners can identify three or more organizational challenges and propose solutions when implementing CAL in BYOD environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
